about.title: About
about.subtitle: Me
about.heading: Developer Introduction
about.description1: Hello! I'm a frontend developer who pursues user-centered web development. I love learning new technologies and always strive to create better user experiences.
about.description2: I have worked on various projects using technologies like React, TypeScript, and Node.js, and I value teamwork and continue to grow through continuous learning.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: & Technologies
skills.description: I continuously learn new technologies and can quickly acquire and apply the skills needed for projects.

project1.title: Portfolio Website
project1.description: A personal portfolio website built with React and TypeScript. Applied responsive design and smooth scrolling.

project2.title: Todo App
project2.description: A web application that allows users to manage their tasks. Implemented data storage using localStorage and drag-and-drop functionality.

project3.title: Weather App
project3.description: A weather information web app using the OpenWeather API. Provides current location-based weather information and 5-day forecast.

footer.copyright: Portfolio. Made with ❤️ using React & TypeScript
